explains: adj. 害怕的，担心的；可怕的；极坏的，极端的

sentences.en: Bankers were fearful of a world banking crisis.
sentences.cn: 银行家们害怕会有一场世界性的银行业危机。

sentences.en: There is nothing so fearful as to be alone in a combat situation.
sentences.cn: 没有比独自一人处于战斗环境中更可怕的事了。

sentences.en: They are fearful that unemployment will soon break the barrier of three million.
sentences.cn: 他们担心失业人数不久将突破300万大关。
